com.bluejmanager

Class BlueJManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bluejmanager.BlueJManager

  • public final class BlueJManager
extends Object
    Manages the BlueJ object for a BlueJ extension
    Version:
    $Id: BlueJManager.java,v 1.6 2007/08/19 03:13:53 stedwar2 Exp $
    Author:
    Rick Giles

      BlueJ application proxy

      private Set<String> mMissingResources
      Which resource files have failed to open successfully? Used to remember which ones we've issued error messages about so that the same messages don't pop up over and over.
      private static BlueJManager sInstance
      singleton

      • mMissingResources

        private Set<String> mMissingResources
        Which resource files have failed to open successfully? Used to remember which ones we've issued error messages about so that the same messages don't pop up over and over.

      • mBlueJPropertiesAdapter

        private BlueJPropertiesAdapter mBlueJPropertiesAdapter
        A properties facade over mBlueJ. Initialized lazily.

      • getBClasses

        public Set<bluej.extensions.BClass> getBClasses()
                                         throws bluej.extensions.ProjectNotOpenException,
                                                bluej.extensions.PackageNotFoundException
        Returns the classes for all valid open projects..
        Returns:
        the set of classes for all valid open projects.
        Throws:
        bluej.extensions.ProjectNotOpenException - if project is not open.
        bluej.extensions.PackageNotFoundException - if package is not found.

      • getBClasses

        public Set<bluej.extensions.BClass> getBClasses(bluej.extensions.BProject aProject)
                                         throws bluej.extensions.ProjectNotOpenException,
                                                bluej.extensions.PackageNotFoundException
        Returns classes for a BlueJ Project.
        Parameters:
        aProject - BlueJ project.
        Returns:
        The classes for aProject. If aProject is not open, returns an empty set.
        Throws:
        bluej.extensions.ProjectNotOpenException - if a project is not open.
        bluej.extensions.PackageNotFoundException - if a package is not found.

      • getBClasses

        public Set<bluej.extensions.BClass> getBClasses(bluej.extensions.BPackage aPackage)
                                         throws bluej.extensions.ProjectNotOpenException,
                                                bluej.extensions.PackageNotFoundException
        Returns classes for a BlueJ package.
        Parameters:
        aPackage - BlueJ package.
        Returns:
        The classes for aPackage. If aPackage is not valid, returns an empty set.
        Throws:
        bluej.extensions.ProjectNotOpenException - if a project is not open.
        bluej.extensions.PackageNotFoundException - if a package is not found.

      • getFiles

        public Set<File> getFiles()
                   throws bluej.extensions.ClassNotFoundException,
                          bluej.extensions.ProjectNotOpenException,
                          bluej.extensions.PackageNotFoundException
        Returns the files for all valid open projects. All project classes must be compiled.
        Returns:
        the files for all valid open projects.
        Throws:
        bluej.extensions.ClassNotFoundException - if a class is not found.
        bluej.extensions.ProjectNotOpenException - if a project is not open.
        bluej.extensions.PackageNotFoundException - if a package is not found.

        Finds the current frame of the BlueJ application.

      • getResourceStream

        public InputStream getResourceStream(String name,
                                     String defaultName,
                                     String description)
        Opens a stream connected to a named resource, which could resolve to a local file resource, a resource embedded in a jar file on the classpath, or a URL. If the resource cannot be opened, a warning message dialog will be shown, unless both the default and description are omitted.
        Parameters:
        name - The name/location of the resource to open. Cannot be null.
        defaultName - The optional name/location of a secondary resource to use if the named resource cannot be located or opened. Can be null if there is not backup resource to use.
        description - An optional brief description of the resource to use in error messages.
        Returns:
        An input stream connected to the resource, or null if the resource (and, if specified, the secondary resource) cannot be opened.

      • missingResourceMessage

        private void missingResourceMessage(String name,
                                    String defaultName,
                                    String description)
        Pops up a warning message indicating that a named resource cannot be found.
        Parameters:
        name - The name/location of the resource that is missing. Cannot be null.
        defaultName - If non-null, the phrase "Using default: ..." will be added to the message, using this name.
        description - An optional brief description of the resource to use in error messages.

      • getResourceStream

        private InputStream getResourceStream(String resourceLocation)
        Tries to resolve a resource name by checking for a file, searching the classpath, or verifying the reachability of a URL.
        Parameters:
        resourceLocation - The name/location of the resource to resolve
        Returns:
        The full name of the resource as a file name or URL if it could be located, or null if no such resource could be found.

      • getExtensionPropertyString

        public String getExtensionPropertyString(String propertyName,
                                         String def)
        Get a property from the extension property store.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - The property to fetch
        def - The default if property is not found
        Returns:
        The fetched property or default

      • setExtensionPropertyString

                                       String value)

        Parameters:

        value - The value of the property
